extendedInfo.description: Funny quotes from our moms.Remember all the sayings your mom had handy for all occasions? If you think this is only your mother you're wrong!Every mom has a favorite quote but everyone have the entire list.Â This is universal!Â Also, you can find beautiful, inspirational and sweet quotes for mother's day in this other app: goo.gl/Ygy5FThis app reminds you all those momisms uttered in desperate moments when mom reached the end of her rope.Read, laugh, SHARE, enjoy!These harsh sounding and yet so sweet advices from mothers is what makes our childhood so special.You can share your favorite quotes over the social network available in your phone, SMS or email.Share on facebook, twitter, google+, and everywhere to convince that you are not the only victim of your mother's cunning.Note: Supports english and spanish quotes. Middle button changes the language.Tags: momism, momisms, mom says, mother says, sayings, quotes, mother's day, mommy, fun, funny

reviews.title: I hate the app
reviews.comment: Plz with all your will don\'t get this app
